name: Abilities of the Transoceanic Sourcewater and Xenochromatic Creatures

imgDesc.text: Sometimes, these strange clusters of "Transoceanic Sourcewater" will appear beside you, allowing you to unleash power using your will and deliver attacks.
When attacking special Xenochromatic Fontemer Aberrants, <color=#ffe14b>their powers can be absorbed for a certain period</color> ...
